issue.title: SubT CommsClient Can't handle ros namespaces

content.raw:
The comms client does not directly interface with the broker. The broker uses only ignition transport, and the comms client for a robot uses only ROS. The relay handles communication between a robot and the broker.

I'm a little unclear on how your using the comms client. You definitely should not implement your own comms client. Is it possible to see what you're doing? We could do this privately so as not to publicly share your solution.
